O

onCameraFrame(CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewFrame) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
starting point for every frame, arranges steps depending on the active mode
onCameraViewStarted(int, int) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
initializes all mats, scalars and other variables, which are needed for the frame processing
onCameraViewStopped() - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
cleanup operations, when camera view stops
onClick(View) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
handle onClick events, such as the manipulation of hsv filter values
onCreate(SQLiteDatabase) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.database.DbAccessFruitTypes
database initialization, when object is created
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
executes various initialization operations - initializes camera view from opencv - initializes fruit type list with data from database - initializes user interface
onDestroy() - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
cleanup operations, if app is resumed
onDowngrade(SQLiteDatabase, int, int) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.database.DbAccessFruitTypes
adjustment operations, when database is downgraded
onPause() - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
cleanup operations, if app is paused
onResume() - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
cleanup operations, if app is resumed
onTouch(View, MotionEvent) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.FoodUiActivity
handle onTouch events (such as displaying nutritional values to a touched fruit)
onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase, int, int) - Method in class vrlab.foodui.database.DbAccessFruitTypes
adjustment operations, when database is upgraded
overlapAnchor - Static variable in class vrlab.foodui.R.attr
Must be a boolean value, either "true" or "false".
